credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Images of Buddha
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Predominantly red poster with a blue and yellow-brown flowered border. Across top and bottom, within border, yellow and brown mosaic, decorative strips with Arabic lettering in brown. In top right, a green figure (possibly Hindu). In left-center, a yellow figure floating cross-legged (possibly Hindu) and in bottom right a third figure (also possibly Hindu). Horizon towards bottom third of image with ocean below and distant island at left.
name: Poster
